question.title: Is there a way to set $JAVA_HOME on a per project basis for Maven?
question.body: Looking through Maven's documentation, I can see that I can set $JAVA_HOME in my .mavenrc in my home directory, but this is a global setting. I have some projects that need a specific maven version (which I manage with mvnvm) as well as a specific java version (java 11.0.29). I'd prefer if I could set $JAVA_HOME per project, maybe as some configuration setting I've missed that goes in one of the many .mvn configs.
